title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The current bug report lacks a description. Please provide a detailed description of the bug.
EB: This issue causes an inefficient redraw during text changes with word wrap. It should at a maximum only require one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Add the following line to the 'performPaint' method in StyledText class:
   System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Run the test case mentioned below.
